basics.name: Louis Schiekiera
basics.label: Psychologist (M.Sc.) · Data Scientist
basics.summary: Psychologist specializing in computational modeling and machine learning research

work.name: Computational Modeling Group, Institute for Psychology, Humboldt Universität zu Berlin
work.summary: Conceptualization and implementation of the computational Swinging Lexical Network model
highlights: Modeling in the intersection of psycholinguistics, machine learning and cognitive science

work.name: Division of Clinical Psychological Intervention, Freie Universität Berlin
work.summary: Utilizing machine learning, scientometrics and behavioral online methods for meta research

work.name: Division of Clinical Psychological Intervention, Freie Universität Berlin
work.summary: Programming experiments, machine learning and statistics for meta research

work.name: Institute for Medical Psychology, University Medical Center Hamburg-Eppendorf
work.summary: Statistical modelling for a research project on pediatric psychooncology

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
